Boris63: ^You see what it has come to! It's our fault! Ruthless trust and blind love for the motherland led us to this place.
^Stop fretting and get the body out. We have research to complete.
^What kind of research? She is dead! Our Shimura is dead!
^She was just one of the links, just like us. We work for the glory of our country whether you want it or not.
^Are you completely crazy? Do you know what will happen to the world if we release this virus? I won't be a part of it.
^You will, or I will force you to do it myself.
